Sir Brian May believes music has saved him from depression PERIOD

The 66yearold Queen guitarist has opened up about his mental health issues admitting hes struggled with dark moods for much of his life but hes convinced being able to play music for a living has helped pull him back from the brink because he uses it as  PERIOD

Speaking to The Independent newspaper he explained And music is the best therapy PERIOD I think depression is built into my psyche PERIOD I think its a hereditary thing something Ive been aware of for a very long time PERIOD And you evolve strategies to deal with it and stay functional.A lot of people do think I was knighted years ago which is quite funny PERIOD I was getting letters that said Sir Brian.Im doing stuff all the time which the government doesnt like PERIOD I fight for the rights of wild animals particularly and certainly people like former British Prime Minister Boris Johnson would find me a complete irritation PERIOD I think it only happened because Boris went away. originally published on celebretainment.com part of the BLOX Digital Content Exchange PERIOD
